Sabretooth tigers and Mammoths are ruling the world and humans are at the bottom of food chain and you can judge the amount of danger which humans have to face. You are a part of a hunting group which has been ripped apart and now you are the last survivor desperate for survival. You need to craft deadly arsenal and fight against deadly predators. You have to become the ultimate predator and have to save the land of Oros. With some awesome visuals and scintillating sounds Far Cry Primal is surely a game to try for. You can also download Far Cry 4.

name: Kopanito All Stars Soccer
description: Kopanito All Stars Soccer is a very enjoyable soccer game and you will probably love its gameplay. It has a skill based gameplay which means that you will have to learn the game’s mechanics as you move forward in the game. You have to be very precise and make your reflexes much better each time you play. There are supermoves and they are also skill-based which means the more you play the more you will gain. There are some supermoves which can freeze your opponent’s supermove. You can play this game with your friends and it supports up to 5 controllers. There are some quick matches which can be 1 v 1, 2 v 2, 3 v 3 etc. and you can create yourself party mode. You can customize the teams, stadiums and match durations. All in all this game is very enjoyable. You can also download Rocket League Vulcan.

And if you have stopped Two-Face in the previous episode than Penguin will attack the police department with his drones Commissioner Peter Grogan will die in this scenario as well. Bruce by arresting these morons have got the confidence of people back as well as he hold the Wayne Enterprises. Batman will confront with Lady Arkham and will convince her to stop but Lady Arkham is convinced to take the revenge and frees all the prisoners. The player has the choice to go as Bruce or as Batman and the final scenario will be different depending upon what character the player has selected to play. With some staggering visuals and awesome sound effects Batman Episode 5 is surely the one awesome feat for this Christmas. You can also download Episode 3 and Episode 4 of this breathtaking Batman series.

You have to defeat the bombshell by using Ms Marvel and her friends in Champions Mode, while you can wage an epic battle in an alternate reality in A-Force table. The A-Force table contains all new storyline and you will see the destruction of Cosmic Cube. And this destruction has created a Russian-controlled alternate reality. Also in this mode you have to keep alive the Cosmic Cube balls in the Table. It has a wizard mode in which you can directly control Black Widow and Madam Masque. In the Champions you help Ms. Marvel and her friends to take on Bombshell which follows a bank robbery. All in all this game is really enjoyable and exciting. You can also download Tabletop Simulator.

name: Hybrid Wars
description: Hybrid Wars is set in 2060 when humanity is on the edge of 2nd technological revolution. You will see that earth has become a web of information, transportation and energy networks. There are sprawling cities, immense military complexes and vast spaceports. The weaponry is also modernized and you will see high tech tanks, choppers and other vehicles. You will command and upgrade your arsenal of mechanics so that you can win the battle against your enemy. It is a classic top-down shooter experience and you will fight against 50 types of enemies. You must gather an arsenal of machines such as tanks, helicopters, robots and mighty titans. There are 8 different locations you have to explore and there are 150 objectives to complete. You can play this game in single player mode and in Co-op mode as well. You can choose your combat vehicle and fight your enemies in the battle. All in all this game is really enjoyable. You can also download GEARGUNS Tank Offensive.

In the university a time travel experiment went wrong and the area is doused with chronon radiation which is a material that makes time travel possible. The antagonist Paul Serene has also got the abilities to freeze time as well as can move at lightning speed. The graphics of this game are very impressive and you will surely love to play this game. She is on a mission and the mission is to conquer all the twelve zodiac worlds in order to gain the ultimate power and make everyone her peon. This game has got free roaming world maps plus it has also got a flexible turn based battle system. This game has been developed in such a way that it will please even the most hardcore J7 player. The twelve worlds which were created on the basis of twelve signs are now under threat as something which was sleeping for a long tume has come out and is going to destroy everything. Chou Chou has got the services of Syrma who is another ultimate goddess. Mugen Souls Z features some tactical 3D battles which features turn based combat. You need to explore the expensive world and have to defeat the enemies that come your way. You can also download The Witcher 5.

You can play the game either with friends or you can also go on a solo flight. This game is reverse of Escape Room game. Your mission is to get in the center of the old mansion that has been made by a paranoid old professor. You will be tested on different grounds. Your skills will be tested in maths, logic, communication, riddles and perception etc. The mansion is generated randomly and the difficulty will be adjusted accordingly. You can play this game in ESCAPE ROOM mode with countdown clock or you can also go for FREE PLAY mode where you can play at your own pace. The game has got more than 20 8s in more than 10 beautiful mansion rooms. You can also download Deponia The Complete Journey.

There is no chance of violation by any state, but suddenly the peace of this world is shattered and it turns into darkness and the enemies come from space cause the destruction in world.  There is only one way of stopping them through arranging Assault suit squadron. It has got excellent visuals and the sounds are also quite imposing. While playing the game jump into assault suit and here you are going to experience eight different stages like alien-blasting, side scrolling and others which help you a lot in completing the mission. You can play Livelock either solo or with up to two allies in order to break stop the war between machines which seems to have no end. Three mechanical chassis Hex, Vanguard and Catalyst are in your control so choose one of them for mission which suits best for defeating other machines which are more intelligent. In this infinite war there is a story mode in which you have to explore the past disastrous worlds and revive humanity. There is another mode name as survival mode in which you just have to fight with your deadly enemies.  You can perform some deadly actions such as shockwaves, earth-shattering and much more just by combining your weaponry. Human Intelligence is going to be tested against the Artificial Intelligence which has evolved greatly in past few centuries. You can also Download Devil May Cry 2.

This game will provide you lots of gaming modes which you can enjoy like it has got a FREE ROAM mode in which you will explore the Ocean City in detail. This game has been powered by the Unreal Engine which is considered as the leading game engine of the industry. This game has got a full fledge traffic and pedestrian system plus a day/night cycle so you can enjoy the races at any time of the day. description: Attack on Titan Wings of Freedom revolves around Eren Yeager, her sister Mikasa Ackerman and their friend Armin Arlert. Some gigantic Titans have breached the wall of their city and Eren has watched with her eyes how one of these brutal Titans has eaten her mother. Furious to take the revenge Eren enrolls in the military with her friends. Five years has passed and the three cadets have been deployed in the Trost District and the Titans have once again attacked. This time around Eren has been eaten in front of Armin’s eyes. Suddenly a Titan appeared and began fighting with other Titans instead of humans. Later this Titan was revealed to be Eren who has been transformed into Titan. Eren helped the humans to regain the control of Trost District but now as a Titan he is being considered as a threat to the humans and is being captured. In the prison Eren has been attacked by a female Title who is considered to be Annie. Later some other friends of Eren also revealed that they can also transform into a Titan. The Survey Corps later decided to take the monarch down by using these Titans. With some awesome action and gripping visuals this is game is a must to play. You can also download Risen 3 Titan Lord.

Elizabeth now needs to interpret the thoughts and emotions with the assistance of protocol unit called Wilco. When you will dig deep into the investigation you will get to know that its more than just humanity lost on deep space. It is in fact a shattering story of betrayal, madness and conspiracy.
